game.name: Arrow Bingo
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Touch the arrow to slide the balls together, leading to One Away, then Bingo!" Touch the arrow to slide an entire line in its direction. You guide the balls to the matching color and pattern sheets and make them reach the goal, line them up to get Bingo, and sink them.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Touch the arrow to slide the balls together, leading to One Away, then Bingo!" Touch the arrow to slide an entire line in its direction. You guide the balls to the matching color and pattern sheets and make them reach the goal, line them up to get Bingo, and sink them.
